name: Mom got stuck in the washing machine
name_original: Mom got stuck in the washing machine
description:
Mom got stuck in the washing machine is a first person funny game for adults only.

You'll play as a horny boy who will unleash all his fantasies about his step mother stuck in the washing machine.



Explore the house and find all the weird stuffs to give your step mom the pleasure she "needs".



An advanced physics system will give you the feeling of playing with a real bouncing ass.



Collect items scattered around the house and use them as you wish (using them to "play" with your step mom is highly recommended), masturbate as a jerk, slap ass and thigs, cum wherever you want: free the most pervert part of your soul and unleash all your deepest fanstasy playing Mom got stuck in the washing machine!
